
### Example 1: Captures the VM by copying virtual hard disks of the VM and outputs a template that can be used to create similar VMs. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Save-AzVMImage -DestinationContainerName {DestinationContainerName} -Name {Name} -ResourceGroupName MyResourceGroup -VHDNamePrefix {VHDNamePrefix}

```
